conversation.content: Look I've been with you guys for what—eight years? Nine? And I'm seeing these ads for new customers getting half off.
Oh! Hi there, um, thanks for calling in today! *sharp inhale* Let me just pull up your account real quick—could I get your account number or the phone number associated with it?
It's under 555-0284. This is just—how's that even fair?
Okay perfect, I've got you here, account ID CUS-884729-BK, and wow you're right, member since March 2015! So, er, you mentioned seeing some promotional offers?
Yeah the—what'd they call it—the "welcome package" or something. Fifty percent off for six months.

*exhales* Right, yeah, I can see why that'd be frustrating. Um, so that particular promotion code NEW50-FALL is exclusively for first-time customers, but let me check what I can—hmm, actually hold on.
See that's exactly what I mean. Nothing. Meanwhile I'm paying full price every month.

No no wait, I'm seeing something here! *sharp inhale* So we actually have a loyalty program that, uh, launched just last week on October 15th, and it looks like you'd qualify for our platinum tier immediately.
Loyalty program. Great. What's that—like five percent off or something useless?
Actually no! *exhales* Er, at platinum level you'd get 30% off your base rate, priority support line 888-PLATINUM, and we'd backdate it to October 1st so you'd get a credit too.
Wait thirty? That's... that's actually not terrible. How long's that last?
Mmm, so unlike the new customer promos which expire after six months, this one's permanent as long as you maintain your account. Let me just, uh, activate it—confirmation code LOY-3847-PL29.
Permanent. Huh. Okay so what's the catch here?

*soft exhale* Honestly? No catch. We've been, er, losing long-term customers to competitors and management finally realized—ooh, actually I probably shouldn't say that part. But yeah, effective immediately, new rate of $69.99 monthly.
From ninety-nine? That's... yeah okay that works. When's this start?
Already done! You'll see it on your November 1st billing cycle, and, um, the credit of $127.45 will appear within 48 hours. Also got you enrolled for text alerts at your 555-0284 number.
Oh. Well. Thanks. That was—yeah that was easier than I thought.
*sharp inhale* Right? Sometimes these calls go way different! Er, is there anything else I can help with today? Oh actually—let me give you that priority number again: 888-752-8464.
No I'm—I'm good. Thanks for actually listening.
Of course! And hey, um, just so you know, your account notes now show VIP status as of today October 22nd, so next time you call, you'll skip the queue. Have a great rest of your day!

scenario: upset because they feel like they're being treated unfairly compared to new customers
